sense.def:
To do something blindly
pomeni tisto storiti takrat, ko ne vidimo dobro.

seg.quote: He ran blindly across the clearing.

sense.def:
Z besedo
blindly
lahko tudi povemo, da nekaj počnemo brez zadovoljivih podatkov ali razmišljanja.

seg.quote: With the information we have now, we can only speculate blindly.
